abstract: Errors that can occur during a card read.
rawMarkdown:

source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardReaderSession/ReadError

# PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError

**Enumeration**

Errors that can occur during a card read.

## Declaration

```swift
enum ReadError
```

## Getting the error

- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.cardReadFailed**: An error occurred when reading the card.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.invalidAmount**: The request contained an invalid amount.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.invalidCurrencyCode**: The request included an invalid currency code.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.invalidPreferredAID**: The preferred AID specified in the transaction request is invalid.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.invalidVASMerchants(_:)**: The specified list of VAS merchants list is invalid.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.invalidVASRequestParameters(_:)**: The specified VAS parameters are invalid.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.nfcDisabled**: NFC is disabled on the device.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.noReaderSession**: No reader session available or the session isn’t ready.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.passcodeDisabled**: Read operations aren’t allowed when the device’s passcode is disabled.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.paymentCardDeclined**: The payment card declined the transaction.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.paymentReadFailed**: An internal failure prevented the read operation.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.pinCancelled**: The current PIN capture was cancelled, also cancelling any ongoing read operation.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.pinNotAllowed**: The time window allowed for a PIN capture after a card read has expired or requesting the PIN is simply not supported by your current configuration.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.pinEntryFailed**: An error occurred when capturing the PIN.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.pinEntryTimeout**: The current PIN capture was not completed in allowed time.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.pinTokenInvalid**: An error that indicates an invalid PIN token.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.readCancelled**: The current read operation was cancelled.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.readFromBackgroundError**: Read operations aren’t allowed when an app is in the background state.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.readNotAllowed**: The read operation isn’t allowed at this time.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.readNotAllowedDuringCall**: Read operations aren’t allowed during a phone call.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.readerServiceConnectionError**: The session wasn’t able to connect the system UI or other services.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.readerServiceError**: A general reader service internal state issue occurred.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.readerSessionAuthenticationError**: An authentication error occurred while refreshing the reader session.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.readerSessionBusy**: The reader is busy with another session.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.readerSessionExpired**: The reader session expired and couldn’t refresh due to other state changes.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.readerSessionNetworkError**: A network error occurred that prevented a reader session refresh.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.readerTokenExpired**: The configuration token for the reader session expired.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.vasReadFail**: An error occurred when reading a loyalty pass.

## Describing the error

- **errorDescription**: A description of the error in plain text.
- **errorName**

## Enumeration Cases

- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.cardNotSupported**: The card is not supported by the current reader’s configuration.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.readerInitializationFailed**: The reader initialization failed, try again.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.readerNotAvailable**: The reader is temporarily unavailable, try again in a few seconds.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.storeAndForwardDeclineFailed**: Decline request was made after the allowance time window.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.storeAndForwardResultNotFound**: Decline request failed because the framework can’t find the read result.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.unknown(code:)**: An unexpected error happened, try again.

## Conforms To

- Error
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
